name: intactile-styleguide
description: Styleguide for the intactile css starter kit

scripts.commit-built: git add styleguide -A && git commit -m "styleguide files at `date`" -n > /dev/null 2>&1; exit 0
scripts.ghpages: git subtree split --prefix styleguide/ -b gh-pages && git push -f origin gh-pages:gh-pages && git branch -D gh-pages
scripts.deploy: npm run commit-built && npm run ghpages
